grumbo.name: Grumbo
grumbo.loss: $name lost! Maybe you should try harder my dude.

toxic_grumbo.name: Toxic Grumbo
toxic_grumbo.description: This Grumbo learned from the best Draven player of all time.
toxic_grumbo.loss: $name lost all self-esteem after been constantly flamed by Toxic Grumbo.

grumbo_thief.name: Grumbo Thief
grumbo_thief.description: A thief who takes some gold if you lose. You also gain a little bit more gold for winning.
grumbo_thief.victory: $name avoided getting their lunch money taken!
grumbo_thief.loss: $name had his pockets cut by Grumbo Thief!

grumbassassin.name: Grumbassassin
grumbassassin.description: The Grumbassassin is out to get you... and take all of your remaining battle stocks too.
grumbassassin.loss: $name has been assassinated by the Grumbassassin!

wumbo.name: Wumbo
wumbo.description: Wumbo this. Wumbo that. But you can't Wumbo your way past a 70% chance of victory against this Wumbo fellow.
